doc:
Jack Carter (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Carter_(actor) 0 Jack Carter (c. 1902 – November 9, 1967) was an African-American actor. He is known for creating the role of Crown in the original Broadway production of Porgy (1927), and for starring in Orson Welles's stage productions including Macbeth (1936) and Doctor Faustus (1937). He appeared in a few motion pictures in the 1930s and 1940s. Jack_Carter ( c. 1902 – November_9_,_1967 ) was an_African-American_actor . He is_known for creating the_role of Crown in the_original_Broadway_production of Porgy_(_1927_) , and for starring in Orson_Welles 's_stage_productions including Macbeth_(_1936_)_and_Doctor_Faustus_(_1937_) . He appeared in a_few_motion_pictures in the_1930s_and_1940s .
